itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used to strengthen Plywood through Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained using Alchemy.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Pure Powder Reagent
item.desc: A Catalyst that can be applied to various Alchemy mixtures.\n- How to Obtain: It can be made using Alchemy.

item.name: Fir Sap
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained from Fir Trees with a Fluid Collector.

item.name: Bloody Tree Knot
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Bloody Tree Knot requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Trace of the Earth
item.desc: A material used for Crafting equipment.\nIt can be Excavated at Ancient Stone Chamber.

item.name: Sturdy Acacia Plywood
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Acacia Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.
